sentences.en: Animal rights activists oppose using any mammal as an organ factory.

sentences.en: Both faculty and students oppose the measures.
sentences.cn: 全体教师和学生都反对这种方法。

sentences.en: Congress is continuing to oppose the President’s health care budget.
sentences.cn: 国会继续反对总统的医疗保健预算。
我强烈地反对那种主张.

sentences.en: It's easier to swim with the tide than to oppose the views of the majority.
sentences.cn: 顺应潮流要比反对大多数人的意见来得容易.

sentences.en: Members are concerned that a merger might mean higher costs, in which case they would oppose it.

sentences.en: Oppose extravagant eating and drinking and pay attention to thrift and economy.

sentences.en: Persist in progress and oppose retrogression!

sentences.en: The old man can't bear anyone in the family to oppose him.

sentences.en: They oppose each other also complement each other.

sentences.en: We oppose interference by any outside force.
